message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique asset. I'm confident you'll find it valuable, and I'm willing to start the conversation with an offer of $1800000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you think the product is pricey, but I'm confident in its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price. My revised offer is $1600000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise, considering the product's unique features and benefits.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think the product is a bit overpriced. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1500000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I get a price that's closer to the minimum I'm willing to accept. My revised offer is $1550000. I'm willing to meet you halfway on this, but I need to see some movement from your side as well.

Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer $1450000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
